Text: "Time Keeps On Slippin" is the fourteenth episode in season three of the animated television series "Futurama".
Triplets:<"Time Keeps On Slippin"
1:
--------------------
Text: Time Keeps On Slippin':  It originally aired on the Fox network in the United States on May 6, 2001.
Triplets:<Time Keeps On Slippin'
2:
--------------------
<Text: Time Keeps On Slippin':  The title is from a lyric in "Fly Like an Eagle" by Steve Miller Band.>
Triplets:<Steve Miller Band
3:
--------------------
Text: Time Keeps On Slippin':  Basketball and time-travel play a prominent role in this episode.
